charges.charge_description: 21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(C) - Possession with Intent to Distribute Heroin

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to 135 months as to Count 1 and 120 months as to Count 2, said terms to run concurrently. Defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years on both counts, to run concurrent. Defendant shall pay a fine of $500 and a special assessment of $200.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) &; (b)(1)(C) Possession with intent to Distribute Heroin, a Schedule I Controlled Substance - CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to 135 months as to Count 1 and 120 months as to Count 2, said terms to run concurrently. Defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years on both counts, to run concurrent. Defendant shall pay a fine of $500 and a special assessment of $200.

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1) Felon in possession of a firearm - UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is sentenced to 135 months as to Count 1 and 120 months as to Count 2, said terms to run concurrently. Defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of 3 years on both counts, to run concurrent. Defendant shall pay a fine of $500 and a special assessment of $200.
